source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SEQ_00<tab>The face of an injured Sekiseigumi blade is twisted in pain.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SEQ_00<tab>クガネの負傷した赤誠組の隊士は、痛みに顔を歪めている。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_TODO_01<tab>Use the milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_TODO_01<tab>負傷した赤誠組の隊士に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DA601 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_000<tab>Ugh... <pant> I must...get word to my brother. But these wounds... I cannot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_000くっ……はぁ……はぁ……。
早く、あいつにも知らせてやらなければ……。
だが、この傷では……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_001<tab>You... You don't look to be one of them. I take great risk trusting you, but I've no other choice. Nor the time. Please, hear me out.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_001お前……奴らの仲間では……なさそうだな。
信用するのは、賭けになるが……時間が惜しい。
すまないが……頼みを聞いてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_002<tab>I am a blade of the Sekiseigumi, and I <wince> came under attack by a foreign devil while on patrol. I fear my fellow blade may meet with the same fate if not warned.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_002俺は……赤誠組の隊士だ……。
警邏の最中に、異国の暴漢に襲われた……。
仲間が……あいつも、襲われるかもしれないんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_003<tab>I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_003俺は、大丈夫だ……。
だが……小金通りの裏道にいる「赤誠組の隊士」に……
俺が襲われたことを伝えてくれ……頼む。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_004<tab>I... I will survive. <grunt> But my Sekiseigumi brother must be told of this attack. He patrols an alley off Kogane Dori. Please, go with haste.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_004俺は、大丈夫だ……。
だが……小金通りの裏道にいる「赤誠組の隊士」に……
俺が襲われたことを伝えてくれ……頼む。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_011<tab>My brother blade? Attacked by a foreign devil? And one so skilled as to injure one of the Sekiseigumi's most gifted... Rushing after this fiend on my own would be rushing to my own death.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_011なに？　仲間が異国の暴漢に襲われた？
しかも……赤誠組でも指折りの剣士が、怪我を負うほどの腕前か。
俺ひとりで追ったところで、返り討ちだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_012<tab>I would ask your help in this. Use this milky white salve on the injured Sekiseigumi blade that sent you to me. For my part, I will send for reinforcements from the barracks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIB02814_000_012お前さん、「」を、
「負傷した赤誠組の隊士」に使ってやってくれないか？
俺は、屯所に応援を呼びに行く。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_020<tab>Did you see word to my brother blade?
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_021<tab>He sent you back with this salve? <groan> Thank you. And thank the gods he is safe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_021このは……。
よかった……あいつは無事だったんだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_022<tab>Worry not. My pain is mostly gone. My apologies for pulling you into this. But I see now I was right to trust you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_022大丈夫……痛みもだいぶ和らいできたよ。
面倒なことに巻き込んでしまって、すまなかったな。
だが、お前を信じてよかった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_023<tab>As I told you, my attackers hail from across the seas. Violence is forbidden in Kugane, but those from abroad have little love for our laws.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_023さっきも言ったが、俺を襲ったのは、異国から来たならず者だ。
クガネじゃ喧嘩は御法度だが、外の連中はお構いなしさ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_024<tab>My brother blade and I broke up their illicit dealings some time ago. No doubt they did not take kindly to that. My guess is they gathered their gil and hired an assassin.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_024奴ら、俺と相棒に違法な取引を邪魔されたのが、
よほど気に食わなかったらしい。
金を積んで、腕の立つ用心棒を雇ったようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_025<tab>Little did they know, we Sekiseigumi are not so easily killed. I hazard my brethren blades have already hunted these scoundrels down and gaoled them by now.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_025だが、赤誠組には、化け物みたいな隊士が大勢いる。
同志に追い詰められて、今頃は牢屋の中だろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_026<tab>You did us a service this day. As one who wears the haori of the Sekiseigumi, on behalf of us all, I thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ711_02814_SAMURAIA02814_000_026とにかく、助かった。
赤誠組の羽織を背負う者として、感謝する……。
